sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UsageAnalyticsLastNMonths</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>UsageAnalyticsLastNMonths</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UsageAnalyticsLastNMonths = Class.create();

UsageAnalyticsLastNMonths.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	dateToYYYYMM : function (/* Date */ date, /* int */ prevNMonths) {
		date.setMonth(date.getMonth() - prevNMonths, 1);
    	var m = date.getMonth() + 1;
    	var y = date.getFullYear();
    	return '' + y + '-' + (m<=9 ? '0' + m : m);
	},

	getLastNMonths : function (/* int */ n) {
		var lastNMonths = '';
		if (!n || isNaN(n))
			n = 12;
		
		for (var i=0; i<n; i++) {
			var now = new Date();
			var formated = this.dateToYYYYMM(now, i);
			lastNMonths += formated + ",";
		}
		
		if (lastNMonths.indexOf(",", lastNMonths.length - 1) !== -1) 
			lastNMonths = lastNMonths.substring(0, lastNMonths.length - 1);
		return lastNMonths;
	},
	
    type: 'UsageAnalyticsLastNMonths'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-07-09 19:21:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>274f7dd0c3220100f0d95b787dba8f0f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UsageAnalyticsLastNMonths</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Usage Analytics" source="com.glide.usageanalytics">92bd744b6d2220100acb70b35343307b</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_274f7dd0c3220100f0d95b787dba8f0f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2013-07-09 20:58:01</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>806</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
